entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @PressSec Ok. The President still golfed and held MAGA Cult Rallies all through February instead of following Covid19 intelligence. That’s not China’s fault. There’s blood on every hand of the GOP from Trump on down. Shame on you.
